price: 44. Y (el Corán) es una exhortación que te honra a ti y a tu pueblo. Y seréis cuestionados (sobre si actuasteis o no según él).
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
